name: The Pebble of Kajaro
tooltip:
The Pebble of KajaroLevel 60

<race>, the pebble held within the frame of this talisman comes from Mount Kajaro in the South Seas. Mount Kajaro is an area plagued by volatility - marked by violent and oftentimes magical volcanic eruptions.

As your bond with the trolls of Zandalar grows, so too shall the power of this pebble. Harness the power of the pebble to strike down our enemies. Be like the mountain: Quick, explosive, deadly...
